body: Here to cry again, found it in june 2020.. Only to come back again for more tears.
This changed my life

Day 11 - Manga 258*
A shame the turn that the series took. My opinion from the beginning stands the same. It should have ended on the first chapter. I felt disappointed, not only was this unnecessarily big, it wasn't really a hentai and the story was useless.
The story that had no consequence lost even more, all that happened was basically useless. While the two of the real world, I guess, made peace, the whole world that we saw was not only fake but also, the character that we saw grow through pain, was but a simple thought of the original. I couldn't feel anything when the male character tried to sacrifice himself not when the other girl also tried and not even when their daughter died. I couldn't feel anything because the author kept making the deaths temporary.
Overhaul, the story should have ended a long time ago, it wasn't even hentai at this point.
2/10.
Good to be back to re-read this masterpiece. The best rework story of evangelion ngl.
best rewrite of evangelion

I come here from time to time to read about an old gold comic once again.. Not now for now my energy is decreasing and my mood is not right.

But i will be back, stay safe stranger who's reading this.. Life took a dive but im still alive and well, i hope yours is better :)
So I recently decided to check out the soundtrack for this series. It's not my type of music but it has a nice sound nonetheless.
This is a masterpiece 10/10
Pretty great 8/10
Honestly masterpiece, really sad tho that their child would dissapear
Page 145 just FUCKING made me cry. The author really understand Misato ptsd
Twice a week i read all of this just to cry and hurt my self again and again
Back here again to cry..

So in his ideal world, he marries and impregnates a girl with the mental development of a child? How the heck did Asuka even finish high school? How can he go to work every day, he cannot possibly leave her alone.

re-reading it sure makes some good memories, didnt even remember the funny thing at page 149.. Glad its still up after 6 years. Ive been here a few times since it was published here.. Maybe in time i will come back and look back at this quality.. I linger for the olden days of discovering this website.
Same goes to E-H.
Ive been here before, but i guess im back again to read it from time to time.. Legend.
SPOILER AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

I want to say that it is currently 12/25/2020 and I have not cried for something as marvelous as this. I will never forget this.. This deserves so much more because like I have never cried so hard in my entire life. It is too beautiful.
Whoever made this put waaaaaaaaay too much effort into this for the whole series to barely get 5000 likes.
Woahh this is crazy
I came here to fap,not find happiness
this is what i think of when somebody says kino.
There is an after story too!
I forgot if I reading on a hentai site
Im sad and happy at the same time.. This story has fucked me up.

Why no one told me about this masterpiece sooner ?? I got hanging after watching End Of Evangelion and ended up searching for answer for fucking weeks. This is it. This is the true ending of evangelion.
10/10 the best manga/hentai i've ever read. I would buy it tbh.

re take. one of the best retelling of evangelion with some spicy flavour. God I've to download the full serie of retake.
4th time read it, still amazed
I got a nosebleed after reading this...
For the last 10 minutes I had completely forgot that I was reading porn
10/10 for the history as for hentai well good i think

good story. Kept me entertained, but does it really count as a hentai? I mean sure that there was the part where shinji was threading the needle with asuka and the part where the naked girl was on the beach, but still... then again, if it wasn't on this site, i probably would have never read this ever.
